website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable, sophisticated-looking bar stool that will add class to any kitchen or bar.
pros: Faux leather cushioned seat available in 6 colors
cons: May be a little tall for low counters

customer_reviews.title: Not height stated on production description.
customer_reviews.text: Stools were well packaged and looked great, few minor flaws in wood but nothing concerning. After assembling them I realized they were both 26 “ high, description states they are 24” high, which is what I ordered. Also, one of the stools is not level. Two of the legs are about 1/4 inch shorter than the other two causing it to wobble. Trying to decide whether or not to return. Was time consuming to assemble. Description is confusing listed as 24” on main ad but 26” in other description. This needs to be corrected. The stools are pretty and look very nice but are a bit higher than what I wanted. The package does describe them at 26”.
customer_reviews.author: ahc

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but NOT sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These stools are very comfy and sturdy. My husband put them together quickly. The brown leather is a chocolate mocha which matches our counters perfectly. Packages were delivered when promised! *Product Update* We've had these benches for less than 2 years and they've both fallen apart. The plywood on both stools has cracked and formed holes under the cushions, and the screws won't stay in anymore. For reference, my husband is 6 feet and 190 and I'm 5'6" 145. We're not exceptionally tall or heavy. I'm really disappointed in these benches. We have to replace them already.
customer_reviews.author: nettie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control made assembly difficult and weakened the product.
customer_reviews.text: Threaded insert missing in the hole for one of the leg fasteners leaving the joint weak.. All tenons not properly trimmed to size -- did not fit snugly into mortises. All these deficiencies discovered after what should have been a simple, straight-forward assembly. Poor factory quality control and very disappointing for what is a handsomely designed stool.
customer_reviews.author: AsIseeIt

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking and grwat price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect stools for my bar. Really nice rivots and nice padding. The support pieces move a little when you put your feet on them, and I even used an impact gun to screw them in. I bought two and they do not match perfect with each other, but not a deal breaker. Overall, great deal on these. P.s. look at the specs, they are about 27 inches tall which is what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Anon.

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you’re handy
customer_reviews.text: Appearance was great, comfort as expected considering padding. Sturdy to sit on but internal construction is not great. We had friends over one evening and more than a few people said they heard a crackling noise when the sat down. Tested it myself and decided remove legs and open the back. Thin flimsy wood under padding had cracked on both sides (where one’s cheeks might align when seated.) I reinforced this using 1x3 and my nail gun. Buy if you don’t mind a little extra handyman work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The stools are nice in color and the padding it good
customer_reviews.text: The stools are nice in color and the padding it good. However on one of the stools the paint has already chipped off and one piece of the wood fell off. I tried to contact the seller but never received any return email. I like the color but I think the quality is poor.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Sneed

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and even prettier in person
customer_reviews.text: Pretty well made and beautiful to look at as well as comfortable. My only complaint is trying to attach the spindles into the legs. They were not cut right and the screws were not quite long enough to make everything tight so we had to buy longer screws and improvise. Other than that we are happy with this purchase. Much better price than what we saw in stores and made better.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Solid. Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant but great value at good price. Solid. Comfortable. Relatively easy assembly but provided tool is small and awkward
customer_reviews.author: Battery needed

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The stool is built with poor quality. Within a month, we broke 2 of them. The top supporting part has a piece of 1mm thin board sitting on a frame. And It's extremely easy to break. So highly recommend all buyer to stay away from this manufacturer unless they change the process and structure.
customer_reviews.author: Berwyn_Man

customer_reviews.title: Nice stool, low price
customer_reviews.text: Love that its padded. Was quick and easy to put together, nothing was missing. They're used almost daily and we've had no issues. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: The best bar stools
customer_reviews.text: I love these barstools that are used often at my bar. I had to get smaller ones after I built my house since the other stools were too big. The chocolate colors fits my color scheme perfect. Lastly, they durable.
customer_reviews.author: Swaylo!

customer_reviews.title: Counter Stool
customer_reviews.text: The counter stool is listed as: Linon Claridge Patches Counter Stool, 24-Inch, Brown, but is actually 26" as I later found out after I received it. Upon further review, it states 26" in the product description. Nice stool, just incorrect measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rosenkranz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Bench
customer_reviews.text: This is my Second bench I bought to match the first one. They are very sturdy. Very easy to assemble. Price could not be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Mar1223

customer_reviews.title: sturdy stools
customer_reviews.text: We bought these after having a few non Expensive stools falling apart. After close to a month of heavy use ( many guests and kids) they are holding strong- no loose screws. They are sturdy. The seats are soft and the feet are somehow passed which is nice to not damage floors. Assembly is not difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Nine

customer_reviews.title: Don’t sit on them
customer_reviews.text: I bought two stools. In putting together the first one a side brace broke and I was missing a washer. Decided to open the other one and use parts from it to at least finish one. While screwing in a tightening screw the screw broke in half. I would be afraid to sit on these chairs. Would definitely not want a guest to sit on them. They are very nice to look at The cushion on the top looks really comfortable. Very attractive quality looking chair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials stay away
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this stool but after a month and a half 2 of the 4 that I purchased broke. Pulled back the fabric under the seat and found the center brace had come apart and the thin wood base had completely broke in half after my 110 pond friend sat in it. While they are nice to look at and kind of comfy Unless you want to buy new ones every month don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: kurrie75

customer_reviews.title: Broken and previously was a returned item!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these stools for a newer home just purchased end of May. Time permitting caused us not to open until tonight and we found one stool unpackaged sandbox was taped good but parts not in original packing like the first stool was. The leg support that the leg attaches to was cracked all the way thru! Someone had returned this and then seller sent out as us and broken!! I have pictures of it all.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Chaudoin

customer_reviews.title: Love this stool!
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchase this stool and needed to get a third. The wood was the same color but the seat was a little darker. But that may be from wear. It took my husband and I about 10 minutes to put together. Same quality sturdy and if I need a forth I will again repurchase this item. I’m very happy with all three of my stool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The small pieces that connect the legs are very easy to crack so be careful. But once together they are beautiful and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful match for kitchen
customer_reviews.text: They were for the kitchen island and were a perfect fit. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L Drane

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to get bracing screwed in all the way, even using electric screwdriver and bracing broke with light pressure from foot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made n strong
customer_reviews.text: These stools r perfect !! Well made n strong enough to support my hubby at 260 lbs with no problems... They look great...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: Parts didn’t fit right. Had to buy super glue to hold it together and very uncomfortable. Honest review
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bursey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put together. I added a little flair to mine by Mod Podging a little bit of animal print around the base of the cushion.
customer_reviews.author: slq_tx

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner in goo condition. Easy to assemble. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Coldwell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good look expensive with the stitching and nail heads very pleased
customer_reviews.author: carol f

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but incorrectly advertised
customer_reviews.text: Stool is advertised as 24" height but is actually 26" height. I originally ordered one stool and put it together before I realized it didnt match my other stools 24" height. I returned the first stool and bought two more thinking it was just a mistake. The next two I received were also 26" height. Nice stool but are not 24" as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: CTC

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. BUT the bottom feet step thingys were not at the same height.
customer_reviews.author: Boone Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality! Stool foot rest broke the first day!! Would not recommend. Waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: jesica heer

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: We bought 8 of these for our kitchen island. They are comfortable and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ann Carey

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Luv luv luv these!!! Sturdy, comfy, and easy to get on and off if.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Right size, right color and right price . Came quickly too
customer_reviews.author: Diane Tomassian

customer_reviews.title: Really nice comfortable stool
customer_reviews.text: Really nice comfortable stool. I would have given it 5 stars but for a support that was slightly misaligned. Overall I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jwdetroit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were actually a good quality and everybody loves them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good appearance and reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: Good appearance and reasonable price! Used for elevated eating space in kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Anthony Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Quite nice. Looks and feels like a higher cost item
customer_reviews.text: Quite nice. Looks and feels like a higher cost item. Rich, neutral color and comfortable construction.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Stools are sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Stools are sturdy and beautiful. I love them. Put them together myself, and I am a 60 year old woman. Easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G.

customer_reviews.title: great stool
customer_reviews.text: Love these stools. They were exactly what I was looking for. Easy to assemble and no issues at this time
customer_reviews.author: jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Nice stool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to tuck under one corner of my kitchen island. It fits perfectly , is comfortable to sit on and doesn't get in the way . Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Gay Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Seat broke underneath
customer_reviews.text: The seat broke under neath the first week. Need a replacement seat
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: love it just the right size for my kitchen counter
customer_reviews.text: love it just the right size for my kitchen counter
customer_reviews.author: K B

customer_reviews.title: Missing a pad on one of the legs otherwise pretty nice.
customer_reviews.text: Missing a pad on one of the legs otherwise pretty nice .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stools were in perfect condition and they were exactly what I wanted. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Stools look great and seem to be good quality but the cushion ...
customer_reviews.text: Stools look great and seem to be good quality but the cushion doesn't align evenly with the stool base. Ordered three and only one fit together correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother buying as they wont last 30 days!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these Feb 7, received around 3 days letter. Loved them out of the box but just noticed today one of the lower cross rails is cracked. We have hardly even used them because our counters are being renovated. Came to the site to see about return or exchange and learned the window for return closed yesterday- exactly 30 days from order. So now have no recourse. Very disappointed. Usually extremely satisfied with Amazon purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L White

customer_reviews.title: Be aware!
customer_reviews.text: You need to have an electric screwdriver to put together the bottom securely fixed, otherwise you will have open spaces if you use a regular screwdriver, you will also need someone strong to do this job.
customer_reviews.author: diandra

product_meta.title: Linon Claridge Patches Counter Stool, 24-Inch, Brown
product_meta.description: Color:brownThis Brown Counter Stool will add stylish seating to any counter or high top table in your home. The sturdy wood frame has a dark brown finish accented by a brown faux leather upholstered seat. Antique Brass nailhead trim and double needle accent stitching adds durablitly to the padded top for an eye catching detail. 26" Seat Height. 275 pound weight limit.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars785 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
